body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Eric James and the customer's name is Madison Hall.  The conversation is about a random business (a Pawn Shop ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Eric James, and I represent ABC Pawn Shop.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Eric, nice to meet you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you too, Madison. May I have your full name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Madison! At ABC Pawn Shop, we take customer privacy very seriously.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That's good to know. What kind of measures do you have in place?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We maintain strict confidentiality about any transactions. Can I also ask for your phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's one two three, four five six, seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! Lastly, could you provide your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's madison.hall at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Madison. I appreciate your trust.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today, Madison. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Will do! Have a great day!
